name: 3D Muscle Car V8 Parking: Classic Car City Racing Free Game
name_original: 3D Muscle Car V8 Parking: Classic Car City Racing Free Game
description:
[IMPORTANT: Due to high quality 3D graphics, this game may not work on older devices] Get ready to strap into some of the best classic V8 muscle cars that Detroit had to offer! Take on a seriously difficult racing challenge. Navigate and steer your muscle car through the city streets, sliding through the corners. Race through the level and park at the blue parking spot at the end. 4 Classic Cars to race. If you beat all the levels it unlocks 2 sandbox levels for unlimited free play.

Features:
• Huge City in day or night conditions
• 12 challenging levels
• 4 Classic Muscle Cars
• Awesome Retro Music
• Video replay – Share your experience with your friends


Compatiblity Information: Due to high quality 3D graphics and level size, this game requires 1024 mb of ram and may not run on older devices. Recommended iPad 3 and up, iPad Mini 2 and up and iPhone 5 and up.
